title: Twitter : number of monthly active users 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monthly active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monthly active users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The difference of Number of monthly active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 306.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 37 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monthly active users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The difference of Number of monthly active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 306.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 37 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The second highest Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the Quarter Q2 '18.
There is a difference of 306.0 between the maximum Quarter Q1 '18 and minimum Quarter Q1 '10.
Quarter Q1 '18 is higher than any other Quarters with value 336.0, followed by Q2 '18, and Q3 '17. Down to Quarter Q1 '10 with the lowest value 30.0.
Over the past 37 Quarters, the Number of monthly active users in millions has reduced.
Similar Number of monthly active users in millions is found in Quarter Q1 '19, Q4 '17, and Q3 '17.
The Quarter Q1 '18 has 1.44 times more Number of monthly active users in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 8614.7.
